|rad1chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861B; |rad1chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = MMCX |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "A65293-001" and "2100701001" is silkscreened on the main board. The CPU used in this device is a '''[[Samsung]]''' S3C4510B01-QERO. The device uses a '''Twist''' TG16C550CJ UART and an '''Altera''' programmable logic device. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ===Serial output=== The console password for the device is the same as the default web admin password - '''Intel'''. ===Boot log=== 

Wait 5 sec to boot or type 'upload' if your firmware was corrupted
and you want to reload the firmware through the XMODEM protocol.
>>Startup in progress !
Please input ROUTER password
Password:
